overview:
About Quick Heal Technologies

Quick Heal Technologies a leading provider of Internet Security tools. Since 1993, Quick Heal Technologies has been actively involved in Research and Development of anti-virus software and has been at the forefront of providing robust security solutions.

Quick Heal Technologies has established Quick Heal product family as industry benchmark for computer security. Serving millions of users worldwide, Quick Heal Technologies employs more than 350 people in eighteen branch offices in India. Quick Heal Technologies also operates through a network of dealers and channel partners in more than 50 countries worldwide. Red Herring has named Quick Heal amongst world’s top 100 private technology companies.

Quick Heal best internet security software, now track your stolen laptop with laptop tracking software, best virus protection antispam software, top antivirus software 2011.

For more information on Quick Heal Technologies, visit www.quickheal.com
